titles.title: Bless the Lord, O My Soul

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bless the Lord, O my soul,
Bless the Lord, O my soul,
And all that is within me
Bless His holy name.
Bless the Lord, O my soul,
Bless the Lord, O my soul,
And all that is within me
Bless His holy name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
King of kings, (for ever and ever,)
Lord of lords, (for ever and ever,)
King of kings, (for ever and ever,)
King of kings and Lord of lords.
